cui_name: Bilateral pheochromocytoma and islet cell adenoma of the pancreas
reasoning: Compound disease term combining bilateral pheochromocytoma (adrenal medullary neuroendocrine tumor) and islet cell adenoma (pancreatic neuroendocrine tumor). No systematic epidemiological data exists for this specific combination. Too heterogeneous, disease-specific, and rare to estimate incidence meaningfully without targeted case series data.
